Interface PageRank.StoppingCriterion

All Known Implementing Classes:
PageRank.IterationNumberStoppingCriterion, PageRank.NormDeltaStoppingCriterion
Enclosing class:
PageRank
public static interface PageRank.StoppingCriterion

A stopping criterion is a strategy that decides when a PageRank computation should be stopped.

Method Summary
 boolean shouldStop(PageRank p)
          Determines if the computation should be stopped.
 

Method Detail

shouldStop

boolean shouldStop(PageRank p)
Determines if the computation should be stopped.

Parameters:

Returns:
true iff the computation should be stopped.
